Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, everyone, to this year's <RED>Cooking
Exhibition</RED>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to introduce our culinary contestants.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, in the <MOJI3> category...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, in the <MOJI3> category...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
with some <MOJI1>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
with some <MOJI2>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
with some <MOJI3>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
with some <MOJI4>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI0> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #<MOJI0>, <CHARANAME0>, with some
<MOJI1>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #<MOJI0>, <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I have the honor of introducing our guest
judge...
<PAGE>
The renowned culinary expert and gourmand,
Saffron!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My name is Saffron. It's a real pleasure to be
here. I can hardly wait to try everyone's dishes!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the judging segment of the
competition. Contestants, if you would please
return to the waiting area? Thank you.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... Mmm...mm? Hmmm...

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm... That was an interesting choice...

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm! This one has some robust flavor to it!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. This one has some promise.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm. The flavor is...all right, but it could use a
twist or two to shake things up...

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, it seems the judging has
concluded. I will now announce the winners.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This year's first-place winner is...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>!
Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME4>! Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 2nd place, <CHARANAME1>!
In 3rd place, <CHARANAME2>!
In 4th place, <CHARANAME3>!
<PAGE>
It was tough to choose from so much good
food, but these are our winners.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, everyone, on your wonderful
dishes!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the awards ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the winner of the <MOJI3>
category, <MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Also, will the winner of the <MOJI3>
category, <MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! Your dish was simply
scrumptious. I couldn't get enough!
<PAGE>
As your prize, take this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>. I hope you continue
making even more amazing dishes!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear, it looks like your bag is full. You'll have
to take something out before I can give you your
prize. Would you, please?

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh well. I'll just have your prize delivered to your
home.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent. Here's your prize.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh? That's a pity.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're really going to give up your prize? Just
like that?

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
By winning today, your <MOJI0>' brand has
been raised to <RED><MOJI1></RED>!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
By winning today, your <MOJI0>' brand...

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
and your <MOJI0>' brand...

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...have been raised by one level!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From now on, you'll be able to ship your
<MOJI0> for a slightly higher price.
<PAGE>
The whole world should have the opportunity to
taste this. I hope you keep shipping more, so
everyone can enjoy your cooking!

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From now on, you'll be able to ship them for a
slightly higher price. I hope you keep shipping
more, so everyone can enjoy your cooking!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
And so, that brings this year's <RED>Cooking
Exhibition</RED> to an end. Ladies and gentlemen, we'll
see you all next year!
